Alike.Action: Covers her mouth, laughing and wide-eyed, tries to back away from the stage but is pushed forward by eager arms waving dollar bills.
Shoves a dollar bill into Laura's chest and shoulders her way past the crowd to reach the stage.
Navigates through a throng of clubgoers with repeated polite apologies to finally reach freedom.
Checks the time on her phone and assesses the situation (Laura no longer visible), then makes a tactical retreat rather than pushing further into the crowd.
Approaches a girl at the bar with initial greeting but becomes awkward and overly loud, failing to maintain the girl's interest.
Tries to get the girl's attention again by inviting her for a drink and snapping at the bartender, but is ignored and ultimately loses the opportunity.
Smiles at the woman who winks at her, but looks away shyly.
Faces embarrassment when the woman loses interest and others sneer, but squares her shoulders and ignores mockery.
Slumps out of line to sit alone on a couch, avoiding interaction.
Rushes Laura to leave, showing impatience and urging her to hurry.
Attempts to engage socially by trying to dance and connect, showing some social initiative.
Fails to effectively assert herself or manage her phone and social interactions with Laura, leading to frustration and loss of control.
Tries to extend an olive branch to Laura, indicating emotional intelligence and conflict management effort.
Appears passive and unable to stand up to Laura effectively, letting Laura control the interaction and phone usage.
Prepares her appearance carefully before leaving the bus (removes bulky shirt, wears earrings, puts on cap and durag).
Sneaks quietly into her apartment late at night, tries to avoid attention, tells sister to be quiet.
Gets frustrated and physically shoves her sister while trying to close the door.
Eases door shut multiple times but fails to keep sister from opening it again.
Quickly hides her backpack and shoes upon noticing her mother at bedroom door.
Slumps on bed and turns away from her mother, avoiding engagement.
Dismisses mother's compliments and shopping suggestion abruptly.
Responds sarcastically or curtly to mother's criticism about her friend.
Snatches off headscarf and storms off to bathroom silently after mother leaves.
Turns on faucet, wets soap and washcloth, then puts them back carefully before sitting quietly and avoiding eye contact with the crucifix.
Responds shortly and minimally to her mother's repeated calls, showing limited engagement.
Waits alone at the edge of school campus while other students interact socially but does not engage with them.
Exchanges a brief confused look with another student but quickly dismisses the interaction and hurries away.
Removes feminine clothes and accessories to avoid attention, retreats to the backmost corner of the classroom, ignored by classmates.

Walks alone in cafeteria, stays at the fringes of the crowd, avoids social interaction.
Prepares herself deliberately by changing clothes quickly and purposefully in the bathroom despite some difficulty with her appearance.
Is unable to smooth her shirt properly and reacts impulsively by yanking out earrings, indicating some insecurity and lack of ease with her presentation.
Receives a high grade (98) on her math test and remains composed despite being ignored by peers and the class chatter.
